Legacy Document

Important: The information in this document is obsolete and should not be used for new development.

Inside Macintosh: Networking With Open Transport / Part 2 - Open Transport Reference

Chapter 28 - Advanced Topics Reference

This chapter provides reference information for sending non-contiguous data, doing no-copy receives, and using raw-data mode. For a discussion of how to use these data structures and functions in your program, see "Advanced Topics".
